channel.title: Post Cards (Posts about To: Anna Roush)

item.title: From: William Thomas Knox, To: Anna Roush
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
From: William Thomas Knox, To: Anna Roush Mailed From: Riverton, Iowa on April 10, 1885

Mrs. Anna Roush Sidney, Iowa

Riverton, Iowa, Apr. 10, 1885 Anna Roush, Sidney, Ia. Dear Sister, Enclosed find $15.00 all the change we have in the store this evening. IF you need more let me know and I will furnish it as I don't want you to be out anything. I wanted to give Nettie some money while here and told her if she needed anything to let me know it. I want her to look as nice and neat as any of the girls and she shall if I can do anything to help it. I seen Delia Sunday eve. and she said she would call on Nettie soon. I received an invitation this eve. from Sidney to attend a party of Laird's on Friday evening and will decline not knowing whether Nettie will be ready to go. They telephoned to me to know whether I would come and will answer in the morning. Hope Nettie will be ready to go out soon. Your Bro, Will
